title: 이달의소녀탐구 #357 (LOONA TV #357)
summary:
0:02 -- They all receive their artist tags. JinSoul hands them out.
0:21 -- She makes HeeJin give Olivia's artist tag to her since she was the first member and Hye is the last.
0:27 -- Hye bites her tag like a wolf.
0:32 -- Olivia can hear some sounds when she knocks a watermelon and hence yyxy calls her the 'watermelon master'. She starts elaborating on the sounds she can hear.
0:54 -- Olivia Hye: "Everyone, ask me when you buy a watermelon!"
